stimulusHtml: Which of the following is an appropriate margin of error for a 90 percent confidence interval to estimate the population proportion of all adults living in the state who would report that television is their preferred method for obtaining the news?

features.html: A news organization conducted a survey about preferred methods for obtaining the news. A random sample of 1,605 adults living in a certain state was selected, and 16.2 percent of the adults in the sample reported that television was their preferred method.
